channel.title: Event on CHILD Lab @ VSU
channel.description: Recent content in Event on CHILD Lab @ VSU

item.title: HCI International 2018
item.description: From July 16th to July 20th, CHILD Lab members attended 2oth International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction. We presented two full-papers and one poster this year. Effects of Video Games on HBCU Students Erick Huston, presenting his work at HCII 2018. Competitively? or Cooperatively? Kenneth Clark, presenting his paper, Competitively Versus Cooperatively? An Analysis of the Effect of Gameplay on Human Emotions and Behaviors, at HCII 2018.
